Detailed Description

An edit field for an email attachment.

This widget managements one attachment edit: it shows a file upload control, handles the upload, and gives feed-back on the file uploaded.

This widget is part of the Wt composer example.

Definition at line 37 of file AttachmentEdit.h.

00027     composer_(composer),
00028     uploadDone_(this),

00030     taken_(false)

00032   /*
00033    * The file upload itself.
00034    */
00035   upload_ = new WFileUpload(this);
00036   upload_->setFileTextSize(40);
00037 
00038   /*
00039    * The 'remove' option.
00040    */
00041   remove_ = new Option(tr("msg.remove"), this);
00042   upload_->decorationStyle().font().setSize(WFont::Smaller);
00043   remove_->setMargin(5, Left);
00044   remove_->item()->clicked().connect(this, &WWidget::hide);
00045   remove_->item()->clicked().connect(this, &AttachmentEdit::remove);
00046 
00047   /*
00048    * Fields that will display the feedback.
00049    */
00050 
00051   // The check box to include or exclude the attachment.
00052   keep_ = new WCheckBox(this);
00053   keep_->hide();
00054 
00055   // The uploaded file information.
00056   uploaded_ = new WText("", this);
00057   uploaded_->setStyleClass("option");
00058   uploaded_->hide();
00059 
00060   // The error message.
00061   error_ = new WText("", this);
00062   error_->setStyleClass("error");
00063   error_->setMargin(WLength(5), Left);
00064 
00065   /*
00066    * React to events.
00067    */
00068 
00069   // Try to catch the fileupload change signal to trigger an upload.
00070   // We could do like google and at a delay with a WTimer as well...
00071   upload_->changed().connect(upload_, &WFileUpload::upload);
00072 
00073   // React to a succesfull upload.
00074   upload_->uploaded().connect(this, &AttachmentEdit::uploaded);
00075 
00076   // React to a fileupload problem.
00077   upload_->fileTooLarge().connect(this, &AttachmentEdit::fileTooLarge);
00078 
00079   /*
00080    * Connect the uploadDone signal to the Composer's attachmentDone,
00081    * so that the Composer can keep track of attachment upload progress,
00082    * if it wishes.
00083    */
00084   uploadDone_.connect(composer, &Composer::attachmentDone);
00085 }

Member Function Documentation

bool AttachmentEdit::uploadNow (  ) 

Update the file now.

Returns whether a new file will be uploaded. If so, the uploadDone signal will be signalled when the file is uploaded (or failed to upload).

Definition at line 94 of file AttachmentEdit.C.

00103       return true;
00104     } else
00105       return false;
00106   } else

00112   if (!upload_->emptyFileName()) {
00113     fileName_ = upload_->clientFileName();
00114     spoolFileName_ = upload_->spoolFileName();
00115     upload_->stealSpooledFile();
00116     contentDescription_ = upload_->contentDescription();
00117 
00118     /*
00119      * Delete this widgets since we have a succesfull upload.
00120      */
00121     delete upload_;
00122     upload_ = 0;
00123     delete remove_;
00124     remove_ = 0;
00125

00127

00129      * Include the file ?
00130      */

00132     keep_->setChecked();

00134     /*
00135      * Give information on the file uploaded.
00136      */

00138     {
00139       std::ifstream theFile(spoolFileName_.c_str());
00140       theFile.seekg(0, std::ios_base::end);
00141       fsize = theFile.tellg();
00142       theFile.seekg(0);
00143     }
00144     std::wstring size;
00145     if (fsize < 1024)
00146       size = boost::lexical_cast<std::wstring>(fsize) + L" bytes";
00147     else
00148       size = boost::lexical_cast<std::wstring>((int)(fsize / 1024))
00149         + L"kb";
00150 
00151     uploaded_->setText(static_cast<std::wstring>(escapeText(fileName_))
00152                        + L" (<i>" + contentDescription_ + L"</i>) " + size);
00153     uploaded_->show();
00154 
00155     uploadFailed_ = false;
00156   } else {
00157     error_->setText(tr("msg.file-empty"));
00158     uploadFailed_ = true;
00159   }
00160 
00161   /*
00162    * Signal to the Composer that a new asyncrhonous file upload was processed.
00163    */
00164   uploadDone_.emit();
00165 }
